r.d: This extension uses libdrizzle library to provide API for communicating with drizzle and mysql databases.
r.n: - Fixed php 5.3 compile issue - there was a bug in libdrizzle v0.3 had to regen const of 0.4 - renamed $obj->errno to $obj->getErrno will likely change back at some point - renamed $drizzle->escape() to $drizzle->escapeString()
